TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleBoolean extends System.ValueType implements class System.IComparable

summary.span: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

span.span: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La principale différence entre un structure et une norme **booléenne** valeur est que, lorsqu’une norme `Boolean` a deux valeurs possibles, `true` et `false`, un structure a trois valeurs possibles, , , ou .The key difference between an structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an structure has three possible values, , , or . Un structure ne mappe pas à Oracle `Boolean` de type de données ; elle est exposée comme une classe de prise en charge plus de commodité.An structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
